Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to review, verify, and correct data extracted from documents before final submission or integration using the validation station in AI Builder. This feature will reach general availability on September 15, 2025.

How does this affect me?
With this feature, the validation station will display data from extracted invoices, receipts, contracts, or other documents in a user-friendly interface which highlights low confidence scores or potential errors for manual confirmation.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit Enhance automated document processing with validation station.

Title: AI Builder â€“ Enhance automated document processing with validation station
